mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cac_board ( cac_board_id, cac_board_title, cac_board_content, cac_board_readcnt, cac_board_create_dt, cac_board_update_dt, cac_board_updater_id, emp_writer_id, cac_board_end_dt, cac_start_dt, cac_end_dt, cac_category ) VALUES ( tb_cac_board_seq.nextval, #{cacBoardTitle}, #{cacBoardContent}, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{cacBoardUpdaterId}, #{empWriterId}, sysdate, to_date(#{cacStartDt},'MM/DD/YYYY'), to_date(#{cacEndDt},'MM/DD/YYYY'), #{cacCategory} )
mapper.select: select cac_board_id, cac_board_title, cac_board_content, cac_board_readcnt, cac_board_create_dt, cac_board_update_dt, cac_board_updater_id, emp_writer_id, cac_board_end_dt, cac_start_dt, cac_end_dt, cac_category ,B.emp_name from tb_cac_board A, tb_emp B where A.emp_writer_id=B.emp_id and cac_board_id = #{cacBoardId}
select tb_cac_seq.nextval as cacBoardId from dual

choose.when: AND (A.cac_board_title LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR A.cac_board_content LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR B.emp_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' )

mapper.select:
select D3.* from( select D2.* from( select rownum as seq, D1.* from( SELECT A.cac_board_id ,A.cac_board_title ,A.cac_board_content ,A.cac_board_readcnt ,A.cac_board_create_dt ,A.cac_board_update_dt ,A.cac_board_updater_id ,A.cac_start_dt ,A.cac_end_dt ,A.cac_category ,A.emp_writer_id ,B.emp_name FROM tb_cac_board A JOIN tb_emp B ON A.emp_writer_id=B.emp_id WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.cac_board_create_dt DESC ) D1 ) D2 where seq >= #{firstIndex} ) D3 where rownum <= #{recordCountPerPage}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_cac_board SET cac_board_readcnt = cac_board_readcnt+1 WHERE cac_board_id = #{cacBoardId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_cac_board A JOIN tb_emp B ON A.emp_writer_id=B.emp_id WHERE 1=1
